Description: Selligent is an intelligent marketing and experience platform that enables B2C brands to #MaximizeEveryMoment with consumers.
Name: Selligent

Methods.Name: List User Lists
Methods.Description: Use this method to retrieve the metadata for all lists the user has access to.

Methods.Name: Add User to List
Methods.Description: Use this method to create a new user record in a specific user list.

Methods.Name: If Exists: User
Methods.Description: Use this method to determine whether a user exists within a list.
